changePublishedIterationsModal.changePub:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the modal to change published iterations
**UI Location**: Change Published Iteration Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the modal to change which iteration of their solution is published
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Change published iterations"
changePublishedIterationsModal.recommend:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text providing advice on publishing iterations
**UI Location**: Change Published Iteration Modal (body)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the modal to change which iteration of their solution is published
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "We recommend publishing all iterations to help others learn from your journey, but you can also choose just your favourite iteration to showcase instead."
changePublishedIterationsModal.updatePub:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit changes to the published solution
**UI Location**: Change Published Iteration Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: After selecting an iteration and before closing the modal
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Update published solution"
changePublishedIterationsModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the modal without saving changes
**UI Location**: Change Published Iteration Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: When the user decides not to change the published solution
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
taskHintsModal.hintsAndTips:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the task hints modal
**UI Location**: Task Hints Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the hints modal for a task
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Hints and Tips"
